+0.36 We urge @USDOL to require gov't contracted tech companies to abide by fed regulations: develop written affirmative action plans #CBCTech2020
+0.36 As of 2014, the % of African-Americans who work for tech companies whom hold sizable government contracts, was only 4.3%. #CBCTech2020
+0.36 However, minorities hired by some of the largest tech companies in Silicon Valley are virtually non-existent. #CBCTech2020

+0.36 African-Americans are majoring and graduating in computer science, they just aren’t being hired in reasonable numbers. #CBCTech2020
+0.36 We’ve heard the excuse from some tech companies that there aren’t many African-American applicants, but that's not the case. #CBCTech2020
+0.36 There's been growth in other industries in African American employment, but strong underrepresentation in the tech industry #CBCTech2020
+0.36 Specifically, we're asking tech companies that hold sizable government contracts to develop written affirmative-action programs #CBCTech2020
